main event: A witness observed a round, bright white object, about the size of a basketball, in Waynesville, Ohio, on 6 November 1957.
interesting points: The object was thought to be a satellite,The observation lasted between 10 to 15 minutes,The report was noted to contain contradictory information,There was insufficient data for a detailed evaluation,The witness reported seeing the object disappear behind trees.
witness description: The witness described the object as looking like a bright star.
